description: President-elect Trump boasted on Monday about special counsel Jack Smith’s move to drop the federal cases against him. “These cases, like all of the other cases I have been forced to go through, are empty and lawless, and should never have been brought,” Trump said on his Truth Social platform, shortly after news broke that…
title: Trump takes victory lap after Smith moves to drop cases

description: The western U.S.’s plans to decarbonize electricity grids by 2050 may be much more expensive than anticipated, as such targets fail to account for the effects of climate change on water resources, a new study has found. Shifts in water availability due to warming could decrease hydropower production by up to 23 percent by midcentury,…
title: Climate-driven impacts on water in US West will raise the cost of grid decarbonization: Study

description: President-elect Donald Trump has pledged to partner with Republicans in Congress to address the federal treatment of marijuana, which would align federal law with state laws and establish a federal regulatory apparatus for a safe, legal and regulated market.
title: Congress, Trump must reform marijuana laws

description: President-elect Trump has tapped Brooke Rollins, a former White House aide in his first administration, to head the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) in his second term.  “Brooke’s commitment to support the American Farmer, defense of American Food Self-Sufficiency, and the restoration of Agriculture-dependent American Small Towns is second to none,” Trump wrote in a…
title: 5 things to know about Trump Agriculture pick Brooke Rollins

description: It’s important to understand the contrast between the exceptional nominees that may be left behind and the kind of nominees we can expect to see from the incoming Trump administration.
title: Senate Democrats owe the nation a fight for Biden’s judicial nominees

description: Ukrainian former professional boxer Wladimir Klitschko took a jab at podcaster Joe Rogan for his criticism of Ukraine using long-range missiles to attack Russia just days after the U.S. presidential election earlier this month. Rogan, during a recent episode of his popular podcast, called Ukraine’s use of long-range missiles inside of Russia for the first time…
title: Klitschko criticizes Rogan for repeating pro-Russian propoganda

description: The vast majority of Gen Z knowledge workers in a new study said they are using artificial intelligence (AI) tools in their work, underscoring the increased embrace of the advancing technology. A research study, conducted by The Harris Poll and commissioned by Google Workspace, found 82 percent of knowledge workers ages 22 to 39 years…
title: Most young knowledge workers using AI: Poll

description: This Thanksgiving, governors should use their sovereign power to put down the executioner’s axe.
title: Don’t just pardon turkeys — use Thanksgiving to spare lives on death row

description: Sen. Bill Hagerty (R-Tenn.), who was rumored to be on Trump’s shortlist to serve as Treasury secretary, said most American’s “don’t care” whether Trump uses the FBI to vet his nominees, something that fellow Republican senators have demanded.  Hagerty argued over the weekend that it doesn’t make a difference to most Americans whether the FBI…
title: GOP senator: Americans don’t care about FBI background checks for Trump nominees
